column4: Hey guy, Can someone tell me how to install xserver-xgl on ubuntu 9.10?
It doesn't seem to be in the repo and google wasn't very helpful
Hey guy, Can someone tell me how to install xserver-xgl on ubuntu 9.10?
no I ran compiz --replace in teminal and I'm going off the errrors...
google for 'compiz-check' and use it to debug compiz for you
so It's most likely XGL prob
I was asking how did you fix it
the commandline ' cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | grep AIGLX' is equivalent to ' grep AIGLX /var/log/Xorg.0.log'
then how did ti fix it? :/
I dont know, maybe the commands you run from instructions from internet
